data.prayer: Spirit, please defend the 796 believers in Misratah against an unwillingness to suffer. Give them courage to face social rejection.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Misratah, Libya
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Jesus, you are the great high priest, please make the 796 believers in Misratah, Libya a worthy priesthood under you.
data.verse: Since then we have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus, the Son of God, let us hold fast our confession.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 631 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Father, please make every disciple be a disciple maker, every home a training center, and every church a church planting movement in the state of Misratah.
Spirit, help the 796 believers find a person of peace today among the 501,904 lost neighbors around them. And help them start discovery bible studies in these unbelieving homes.
data.verse: Suddenly a man in shining clothes stood before me and said, ‘Cornelius, God has heard your prayer and remembered your gifts to the poor. Send to Joppa for Simon who is called Peter. He is a guest in the home of Simon the tanner, who lives by the sea.’ So I sent for you immediately, and it was good of you to come. Now we are all here in the presence of God to listen to everything the Lord has commanded you to tell us.”

data.prayer: Lord, please remember the Romani, Domari people. you said you wanted worshippers of every tongue and tribe and nation, yet we know of no worshippers among them.
Father, put the people who are lonely into families in the state of Misratah.
data.verse: God sets the lonely in families. He brings out the prisoners with singing, but the rebellious dwell in a sun-scorched land.

data.prayer: Jesus, help the local leaders in Misratah, Libya to be faithful with what they have been given, whether a little or a lot.
data.verse: Everyone to whom much was given, of him much will be required, and from him to whom they entrusted much, they will demand the more.

data.prayer: Lord, please make the same Spirit that raised Jesus from the dead give life to those who are called by his name in the state of Misratah.
data.verse: But if the Spirit of him who raised up Jesus from the dead dwells in you, he who raised up Christ Jesus from the dead will also give life to your mortal bodies through his Spirit who dwells in you.
